summary: This is a little Script just to do one thing - to get rid of the armor of Lydia.
descriptionHtml:
Undress Lydia

This is a little Script just to do one thing - to get rid of the armor of Lydia.

It removes the Chestarmor ONLY, this is required because if you remove all of
the essentials it will be respawn every time you enter a door or travel fast to
another location. It seems this is not happening if you only remove one part of
the essential clothings. :-)

Installation / Start

1. Put the \"undresslydia.txt\" to your ..Skyrim/Data/.. folder.
2. Start the Game
3. Enter console and click on your \"Lydia\" buddy.
4. Enter     bat undresslydia       and Enter.
5. Left the console, now you can give her other Items to use.

Note: If you want to see what else Lydia or another character have, just the
same way but enter in console: \"inv \" (without the \") now select the character
you want and what is have, but remember dont remove ALL the essential \"BAD ID\"
clothes.

Have fun, triplex2011
author: triplex2011
